post.author: David_020
post.body: My first reaction to the leak yesterday was "Really? This close before the release date?". Sure it's interesting to see what the build looked like before the final one. But to me, it feels like a moot point to take the trouble to go looking for it. The final will be out in 2 weeks. Can't people wait?

post.author: =FF=Sturm
post.body: right now its the most smooth id tech 4... but the ui is simple... very simple + the red arrows kill everything

post.author: Zenix
post.body:
Mixed thoughts about the game so far. The UI is bad as everyone has stated. The game itself seems like a dumbed down version of Enemy Territory, which is not a good thing in my opinion. I'm not a fan of people blaming consoles for crappy PC games, but a guess would say that that is the case in this situation.

Will still have to wait to get the proper game with some good servers up to give a real opinion.

post.author: Jack Rammsdell
post.body: I hadn't realized the game would be out so soon. I tried the mp demo in just an offline match running around the level shooting air. Just the gameplay of that simplistic trial seemed more promising than doom3's multiplayer experience.

post.author: Jack Rammsdell
post.body: They are upset that people are basing their final opinions on an unfinished product. It's the same situation when the doom 3 alpha was released. I saw on digg.com someone posted a video of the beta with the graphics way down. Most of the comments on there were all negative, most stated it was a horrible looking game. It sucks because I haven't seen a lot of advertisement for the game outside of the id community so people are seeing the video of that gameplay first before they see any other media and assume the whole game will be of such sub-standard quality.

post.author: The Happy Friar
post.body: people here on this board were saying the games substandard quality because you could see triangles in the flamethrower & rough edges on some arms. There's no need for leaked videos.

post.author: Jack Rammsdell
post.body: I do admit, I turned everything up to max to see if it was just the default video settings in the game, and it still looks like garbage. it looks like they barely touched the renderer. Sadly the game seems like it is going to flop, nothing new, yet another old time shooter. Is this game even going to be sold in germany? I know the original was banned.

post.author: Zenix
post.body:
It's a big fail on Activision's part, that the first ever multiplayer gameplay videos released are from a a leaked beta with the graphics turned right down.

It'd be hard to imagine a marketing campaign worse than Activisions. Personally I'm very glad that id dumped them, and hope EA can do a better job on Rage.
